model.name: Wan2.1 Chrono Edit Distill 14B
model.description: This model in an Image Editor that will follow your instructions. It generates internally a video to produce the desired effect on the original image (the result being the End Image). It expects a very specific prompt format. It is why you must absolutely use the Prompt Enhancer that has been tuned for this model. This version is accelerated using the Chrono Distill

prompt: Rotate the pose of the woman so she that is facing the right
